titleStmt.title: Logoi Ōraioi. Three seasonable sermons the first preach't at St. Mary's in Cambridge, May 31. 1642. The others designed for publick auditories, but prevented. / By Tho. Stephens, M.A.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Thomas, fl. 1648-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for John Crooke at the ship in St. Pauls Church-Yard.,
